Package org.apache.mesos.config

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConfigStore<T extends Configuration>
    This interface should be implemented in order to store and fetch Configurations presented to Schedulers.
    Configuration
    This interface defines requirements for objects which wish to be stored in the ConfigStore.
    ConfigurationFactory<T extends Configuration>
    This interface defines a way for previously stored Configuration objects to be reconstructed from a byte array.
    ConfigurationValidation
    The ConfigurationValidation interface should be implemented by any class which intend to validate a new Configuration w.r.t.
    TaskConfigRouter
    Interface which maps configuration settings to task types, returning ConfigNamespaces on a per-task-type basis.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigNamespace
    A grouping of settings which all share a given namespace, which is defined as a prefix on the setting keys.
    ConfigNamespaceTest
    Tests for ConfigNamespace.
    ConfigurationValidationError
    Signals a certain configurationField is incorrectly configured.
    ConfigValue
    Wrapper around a string value, providing convenience functions for converting the string to various types.
    ConfigValueTest
    Tests for ConfigValue.
    DefaultConfigFileSpecification
    Basic implementation of ConfigFileSpecification which returns the provided values.
    DefaultConfigurationValidator
    Default Configuration validator, which validates a given new Configuration w.r.t.
    DefaultConfigurationValidatorTest  
    DefaultConfigurationValidatorTest.TestConfig  
    DefaultTaskConfigRouter
    Default implementation of a TaskConfigRouter which interprets the system environment, searches for environment variables that start with "TASKCFG_<TASKTYPE>_" and/or "TASKCFG_ALL_", and returns appropriate ConfigNamespaces for task types based on that environment.
    DefaultTaskConfigRouterTest
    Tests for DefaultTaskConfigRouter.
    JsonUtils
    Contains static Json manipulation utilities.
    RecoveryConfiguration
    Represents the recovery configuration in JSON.
    StringConfiguration
    This class implements the Configuration interface for configurations stored as Strings.
    StringConfiguration.Factory
    Factory which performs the inverse of StringConfiguration.getBytes().
    YAMLConfigurationLoader
    Utility class that helps load YAML configuration into a POJO, while ensuring that environment variables can override pre-configured configuration values.
    YAMLConfigurationLoaderTest  
    YAMLConfigurationLoaderTest.TestConfig  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConfigStoreException
    Exception that indicates that there was an issue with storing values in the config store.
